name: Matt and Tony's Kitchen x Tavern

reviews.text: We ate here while visiting Columbus for the National Trucking Championship. The food was very good, we had cheese sticks for appetizers, I had the Pimento...

Ordered via Grub Hub and order was incomplete. It was however delivered quickly. 
I know they have great chocolate cake that can be shared by 4-6 people!!...

The name and menu have changed but this is still an excellent place for dining and drinks.

They have a great and reasonably priced wine selection and some...
